description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/02736/HOU (Demolition of existing garage and erection of front porch, two storey side and single storey rear extensions with associated changes to fenestration). Amendments to include ground floor side extension extended to forward of house line by 1m with integral front porch
site_name: 97 Beverley WayNew MaldenLondonSW20 0AW
decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 20/02736/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:VD132/PL01 EXISTING FLOOR PLANS VD132/PL02 EXISTING ELEVATIONS VD132/PL03 PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS    VD132/PL04 PROPOSED ELEVATIONS    VD132/PL05 EXISTING AND PROPOSED BLOCK PLANVD132/PL06 SITE LOCATION PLAN   Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Please check the scale on the Ground Floor 45 degree plan. The annotated dimension states that the depth of the proposed extension is 1.65m, but other plans show the extension as 3.3m deep. For consistency, please check the scale and annotation for this plan.
